markdownRemark.html:
Impulse Works

Description

Impuls-e is a Digital Agency focused on helping our clients build their online digital presence.

Solution

Site developed with the Gatsby framework. Below some information about the result.

All information is based on the ** Mobile ** screen and was taken from the websitePageSpeedInsights > - By Google

  • The page score was 83 points.
  • The time that the first content is drawn on the screen was 1.3 s.
  • The speed index was 1.3 s.
  • The time it takes the page to be completely interactive was 5.1 s.

frontmatter.techs: reactjs, gatsbyjs, graphql, styled-components, eslint, prettier
frontmatter.title: Impuls-e
frontmatter.description: Creation of an institutional website for the company Impuls-e
